messages: b4e23593ef02e114f30b5b85761fe1e4 (12:03): hey hey, a few of us are quoted in this article
b4e23593ef02e114f30b5b85761fe1e4 (12:05): rich, me, and one of the guys here from johns hopkins
348355965eb3105e5ac7b48f1d3829e9 (12:07): admin topic question:How do I list the packages that were added  by pkgadd ?
348355965eb3105e5ac7b48f1d3829e9 (12:19): I am trying to build xen on soalris according to instructions:
348355965eb3105e5ac7b48f1d3829e9 (12:20): BUT it  is not in PATH
b4e23593ef02e114f30b5b85761fe1e4 (12:20): make sure /opt/SUNWspro/bin is in your path
348355965eb3105e5ac7b48f1d3829e9 (12:20): I thought that building xen is supposed to be with gcc
b4e23593ef02e114f30b5b85761fe1e4 (12:20): dunno, I haven't tried to do that yet
b4e23593ef02e114f30b5b85761fe1e4 (12:21): my test box got... reappropriated :/
348355965eb3105e5ac7b48f1d3829e9 (12:21): says that you must have # SUNWgcc
348355965eb3105e5ac7b48f1d3829e9 (12:22): let's put it other way: how do I know ig a packackage contains cscope?
348355965eb3105e5ac7b48f1d3829e9 (12:22): I want to check if also SUMWgcc includes cscope
53e86cb71746c2a78d3aaf322da11ffc (12:24): SUNWspro is where I have cscope
348355965eb3105e5ac7b48f1d3829e9 (12:26): but are you sure there is no cscop in SUNWgcc
348355965eb3105e5ac7b48f1d3829e9 (12:27): richlowe, anyhow I assume that I should add it to path AFTER the path to the gcc binaries
348355965eb3105e5ac7b48f1d3829e9 (12:27): because as I undestand Xen on solaris should be built with these gcc binaries
72bac19ca0a2ff15f99326a8f7e02c10 (12:28): the two don't conflict in naming.
348355965eb3105e5ac7b48f1d3829e9 (12:30): richlowe, OK (I was afraid there was a confilict )
348355965eb3105e5ac7b48f1d3829e9 (12:36): added SUNWspro to the path and now ; "/usr/sfw/bin/gas: unrecognized option `--divide'
348355965eb3105e5ac7b48f1d3829e9 (12:42): isn't gas forbidden by Geneva law?
d29f7858616789349f2e17f17eaa3395 (12:43): I don't really get these "war rules", war has no rules, if you accept rules, you have an agreement, if you make war, you don't have agreements.
b4e23593ef02e114f30b5b85761fe1e4 (12:43): sickness: once upon a time, war was a gentlemanly afair
b4e23593ef02e114f30b5b85761fe1e4 (12:44): sickness: now we're back to apes weilding sabertoothed tiget femur bones
